description:
This course is for anyone who is interested in investing in Ethereum. I'll show you how to purchase Ether on the most popular exchanges, like poloniex and coinbase. We will be using the Ethereum Wallet; the official applications for storing Ether. I'll also review relevant terms and investing practices to help you invest with more confidence in cryptocurency, with the goal to get you up and running as soon as possible so you can start your new and exciting journey with Ethereum.

All videos are included as a free download and you are welcome to use the videos however you want, or simply to follow along with the projects as we move through the lessons. 

You should take this course if you are at all interested in investing in Ethereum. We will start with basic principles and move through to more advanced stuff so you will be prepared to create wealth with Ethereum.
title: Ethereum Course for Investors
